item.title: FT Most Read: Tuesday, January 7, 2025 at 12:30 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Canadian Prime Minister Justin Trudeau announces resignation
2. Starmer hits back at Musk over comments on historic sex abuse cases
3. New jets help passengers avoid congestion at hub airports
4. [Opinion] Dungeons & Dragons shows that modish guff doesn’t serve diversity and inclusion
5. [Opinion] The Gen Z problem for audit firms
item.guid: FT Most Read: Tuesday, January 7, 2025 at 12:30 PM UTC
